Articles.Content:
Here's my first real contribution to the KSP Forums after quite some time playing around with this game.

I present to you Sphex Pensylvanicus MkV. I went through four different versions of this; some small, some much larger, but ultimately I am happy where this one is sitting. It can only achieve LKO, rendezvous, attack, and return, but that may just be my crappy piloting skills. Maybe somebody with a bit more skill can get it higher? Maybe I'm doing something completely wrong.

The two missiles work. Most of the time. Since 0.19, missiles don't seem to work quite as well as they used to. I've tweaked these so much my head hurts, but I got them to fly mostly straight. You will have to aim slightly off-set if you want to hit your target though.

Action Groups:

1 - Jet Engine Toggle

2 - Jet Engine/Rocket Toggle

3 - Intake Toggle

7 - Left Missile

8 - Right Missile

0 - Ladder Toggle

Without further a due, some pretty pictures to look at!

Moving with incredible velocity!

So pretty.

I hit it! Quite by accident I think, but I hit it!

Happy flying!

Craft File
